title: REALLUSION.ICLONE.PRO.V3.1-EDGEISO
description:
_ _____  ______    _____     _ _____
        ._/ \___/._       _/  __/__._/ \___/
        |    __/__|  __       \        __/___.     Living on the EDGE
        |  _/     :    /    /   _/    /  _/      |


        RELEASE NAME ..... Reallusion iClone PRO v3.1
        SUPPLIER ......... Team EDGE
        CRACKER .......... Team EDGE
        PROTECTION ....... Serial + Online Activation
        RELEASE DATE ..... 23/11/2008
        SIZE ............. 1 CD
        URL .............. http://www.reallusion.com/iclone/



  PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

                           Reallusion iClone PRO v3.1

   iClone3 is a rapid 3D creation program for pros or anyone interested
   in getting started with 3D.

   Explore the speed and time-saving productivity of visual computing with
   3D real-time animation. iClone 3 is designed for users of all skill
   levels to create movies, web media, visualizations and presentations
   with 3D content.

   iClone3 is the complete 3D movie machine with real-time animation and
   actor creation tools for rendering movies with ultimate detail.

   Design actors that are ready to take the stage as fully animated 3D
   avatars featuring custom faces, facial animation, motion, clothing
   and accessories.

   Build scenes with actor-interactive props, elaborate architecture and
   natural environmental elements including sky, terrain, water and
   atmosphere.

   Film iClone animation in real-time with advanced live actor
   puppeteering and vehicle piloting powered by keyboard hotkeys
   and game-like mouse look control.

   Export and share your movies online or as footage for post-production
   video projects.

   There is much to discover inside iClone3 and we are excited to set
   you on your journey into the most powerful toolset in real-time 3D
   animation.

   What we have not included in iClone3 is your stories and your
   imagination; the heart of iClone.

   All of the engineers and Reallusion visionaries have spent countless
   hours pioneering and fine-tuning this release, yet the real killer
   feature and true magic of iClone is YOU.

   Welcome to the 3D Movie Machine, iClone3.

   The Resource Pack is included on the CD aswell, to install it run
   IC31_Enu_Resource_Pack.exe.



  INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

   1. Unrar, Burn or mount with Daemon Tools.

   2. Run IC31_PRO_Enu.exe.

   3. Generate a Serial Number with the keygen located in the EDGE directory.

   4. Enjoy a fully unlocked copy!



                        ---> QUALITY BEATS QUANTITY
